mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_game_user (game_no, user_no, score, game_data, last_update) VALUES (#{gameNo}, #{userNo}, #{score}, #{gameData}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT a.rank, a.user_no, b.user_nm, b.user_img, a.score FROM (SELECT user_no, score, rank() OVER (ORDER BY score DESC) as rank FROM tb_game_user WHERE game_no = #{gameNo}) a, tb_user b WHERE a.user_no = b.user_no ORDER BY a.rank
SELECT game_no, game_nm, game_url, game_cash FROM tb_game
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_game (game_no, game_nm, game_url, game_cash) VALUES (#{gameNo}, #{gameNm}, #{gameUrl}, #{gameCash});
